about.subTitle: Passionate about creating web solutions and an AI enthusiast, always exploring new ways to innovate and optimize processes.
about.firstParagraph: I am a full stack web developer with extensive front-end experience. I have strong knowledge in jQuery, React, Next.js and experience with Gatsby, which allows me to create intuitive and dynamic interfaces by applying current best practices and technologies.
about.secondParagraph: On the back-end, I work with Node.js and Python to develop REST APIs and automated ETL processes. I also have experience with Java, enabling me to build robust services. My in-depth knowledge of relational databases, especially SQL Server, allows me to effectively manage and integrate data in complex systems.
about.thirdParagraph: As a software engineer, I prioritize creating scalable and sustainable solutions by writing clean, well-structured code. Additionally, I am an AI enthusiast, constantly seeking new technologies to transform processes and drive innovation in software development.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subTitle: Some of my experiences as a developer and student
experiences.card1title: Introduction to the World of Development
experiences.card1description: My first 'Hello World'. This is where I began self-studying and became self-taught.
experiences.card2description: After building a solid foundation, I deepened my studies by developing personal projects.
experiences.card3description: After a year of self-study and honing my skills, I enrolled in the Software Analysis and Development program at Universidade Cruzeiro do Sul.
experiences.card4description: I began my professional career as a full stack developer, creating and enhancing web applications.
experiences.card5description: I worked as a systems analyst, gathering requirements, modeling systems, and developing full stack web applications using jQuery, Node.js, and SQL Server.
experiences.card6description: I graduated in Systems Analysis, deepening my knowledge in databases, web and mobile development, and strengthening my foundation in software engineering.
experiences.card7description: Currently, I work full-time as a systems analyst at Octea. In my spare time, I freelance and continue to advance my knowledge in various technology areas, such as web development, data science, and machine learning.

resume.subtitle: Passionate about creating web solutions and an AI enthusiast, always exploring new ways to innovate and optimize processes.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: I have worked on various web projects over the years, contributing to organizations of different sizes:

one.description: Responsible for developing web applications from scratch and implementing new features in existing systems. I worked on requirement analysis, front-end and back-end development, ensuring efficient integration between various platforms and utilizing agile practices to deliver scalable solutions.

activities.one: Development and support of front-end features using React.js, Next.js, and Gatsby.js.
activities.two: Creation and maintenance of back-end features with Node.js, Express.js, Koa.js, and Nest.js.
activities.three: Utilization of cloud services such as AWS (EC2, SES, Lambda).

two.description: Worked as a systems analyst and full stack developer, creating complex systems and providing support for existing solutions. Responsible for requirement analysis, interface creation, API development, automated processes, scheduled tasks, and relational database modeling.

activities.one: Development and support of front-end features using jQuery.
activities.two: Creation and maintenance of REST APIs with Node.js.
activities.three: Development of processes and structures with SQL Server.

three.description: Currently, I work as a systems analyst and full stack developer, conceptualizing and implementing complex systems from scratch. I contribute to requirement analysis, interface creation, API development, automated processes, and relational database modeling.

activities.one: Conceptualization and development of applications from scratch.
activities.two: Validation of PRs and release management.
activities.three: Implementation and management of messaging queues with RabbitMQ.
activities.five: Automation of manual processes, boosting productivity.
activities.six: Creation of ETL processes using Python and SQL Server.
activities.seven: Providing technical support to the team and assisting with business rules.
activities.eight: Management of cloud resources with Azure (VMs, Storage, DNS, etc.).

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Links to some of my work can be found at isaquedev/projects. Additional details can be provided upon request and by scheduling a demonstration.
